results.title: Armor
results.overview: Zırhlı araç güvenlik görevlisi James Brody, oğlu Casey ile birlikte bankalar arasında milyonlarca doları taşırken, Rook liderliğindeki bir grup hırsız, serveti ele geçirmek için kamyonlarına el koymaya yönelik bir plan yapar. Şiddetli bir araba kovalamacasının ardından, Rook kısa sürede zırhlı kamyonu çevreler ve James ile Casey kendilerini harap bir köprüde köşeye sıkışmış halde bulurlar.

results.title: The Adventures
results.original_title: ผจญภัยล่าขุมทรัพย์หมื่นลี้
results.overview: Joy, a secretary at a large multinational company, has an online shopping problem, likes to read adventure novels and watch travel and adventure shows. She daydreams about living a life of adventure.

results.title: Linda
results.overview: Self-assured, mysterious, and captivating Linda agrees to work at an affluent home in Buenos Aires. Her charm sparks strong sexual attraction among all members of the family, exposing how fragile their externally happy veneer really is.

results.title: Dirty Angels
results.overview: During the United States' 2021 withdrawal from Afghanistan, a group of female soldiers posing as medical relief are sent back in to rescue a group of kidnapped teenagers caught between ISIS and the Taliban.

results.title: Elevation
results.overview: Kıyamet sonrası Rocky Dağları'nda geçen filmde, bekar bir baba ve iki kadın, küçük bir çocuğun hayatını kurtarmak için evlerinin güvenliğinden çıkarak korkunç yaratıklarla yüzleşmeye giderler.

results.title: Durdurulamaz
results.overview: Tek bacakla doğan ancak yılmaz ruhu ve kırılmaz azmi sayesinde tüm zorluklara meydan okuyup hayallerini kovalayan Anthony Robles'ın ilham verici gerçek hikâyesi.

results.title: A Prayer for the Dying
results.overview: Martin, an I.R.A. hitman, is seen by a Catholic priest while carrying out a hit. He grows a bond with the priest and his niece. But his past and his former employers put all their lives in danger.

results.title: Silahşörü Destekleyin
results.overview: Bir dolandırıcı, iki rakip şirketin kontrol ettiği bir maden kasabasına gelir. Her iki şirket de onun ünlü bir silahşör olduğunu düşünür ve diğerini kasabadan kovması için onu işe almaya çalışır.

results.title: Gecikme
results.overview: Akut agorafobi hastası olan profesyonel oyuncu Hana, oyununu geliştiren yeni ekipman aldığında, bunun aklını mı okuduğunu yoksa onu kontrol edip etmediğini merak etmeye başlar.

results.title: ¡Qué buena está mi ahijada! 2
results.overview: Adrián, a playboy who has known how to take advantage since he can remember. He meets Lucia, who is a climber in all respects and the goddaughter of a rich man.

results.title: When Mom Is Away... With the In-laws
At The End Of The Day
results.overview: In an increasingly crazy world, Lino, who has decided to leave everything behind, will come to realise that, at the end of the day, everything that happens to us is for our own good!

results.title: Darling Trap
results.original_title: Belle comme la femme d'un autre
results.overview: Clémence is pathologically jealous. Gabriel has asked her to marry him. To test whether he is faithful, unbeknownst to him she arranges that he crosses paths with beautiful Olivia...

results.title: Haydut
results.original_title: I mitici - Colpo gobbo a Milano
results.overview: Fabio ve Enzo, dürüst olarak çalışan birer anten tamircisidir. Ancak Milano'daki bir kuyumcuyu soyma kararı alırlar. Bu iki kişilik "acemi suçlular", birden bire, profesyonellerden oluşan bir çeteye dönüşür. Hırsızlık girişimi kötü sonuçlanır ve polis, aynı yeri soymaya çalışan farklı bir çeteyi tutuklar. Kaçmaya çalışan acemi hırsızlar, tesadüf eseri bir hazine bulurlar 5 milyar liret dolu bir çanta.

results.title: No Man's Land
results.overview: Late one night, Bill Greer and his son Jackson patrol their ranch when Jackson accidentally kills an immigrant Mexican boy. When Bill tries to take the blame for his son, Jackson flees south on horseback, becoming a gringo "illegal alien" in Mexico. Chased by Texas Rangers and Mexican federales, Jackson journeys across Mexico to seek forgiveness from the dead boy's father only to fall in love with the land he was taught to hate.

results.title: Happy Go Lucky
results.original_title: Non è vero ma ci credo
results.overview: Nunzio and Paolo have always been friends but their partnership has only produced a series of failed businesses financed by their wives, who are now threatening to throw them out of the house. The two seek redemption by opening a vegetarian restaurant until, to please a food critic on whom their destinies depend, they find themselves faced with the need to transform the place into a steakhouse. Convinced vegetarians, Nunzio and Paolo have no intention of actually cooking animals. Can vegetable steaks be passed off as real meat? It's the beginning of a spiral of hilarious events.

results.title: Zillion
results.overview: It's 1997. Frank Verstraeten, a computer genius with a nose for business, a fascination for nightlife and an unhealthy urge to prove himself, only wants one thing: his own disco that not only outperforms the competition but simply humiliates it. The futuristic mega discotheque Zillion is a fact and Frank turns from computer dealer to the pivotal figure of the Antwerp nightlife. He parades with the most beautiful women in Belgium and forges an alliance with Dennis Black Magic, the porn king who provides the spicy extras. Unfortunately, beautiful songs don't last long either.

results.title: Reagan
results.overview: Told through the voice of former KGB agent Viktor Petrovich, whose life becomes inextricably linked with Ronald Reagan's when Reagan first caught the Soviets’ attention as an actor in Hollywood, Reagan overcomes the odds to become the 40th president of the United States.
